meanings.definition: A person or thing that curtails.
meanings.sent1: The curtailers in the company helped reduce unnecessary expenses.
meanings.sent2: The curtailers at the event ensured that the program stayed within budget.
meanings.sent3: The curious curtailers accidentally cut short the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The curtailers of time swiftly trimmed away the unnecessary moments.
meanings.sent5: The diligent curtailers carefully trimmed the overgrown bushes in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The group of curtailers gathered to discuss their strategies.
meanings.sent2: The curtailers in the room all agreed on the need for budget cuts.
meanings.sent3: The playful curtailers decided to shorten their names for fun.
meanings.sent4: The curtailers of the forest were the beavers, always cutting down trees.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated curtailers worked together to reduce waste in the community.
